name: bey-avatar-example
description: Example project for LiveKit Bey Avatar Plugin

scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const missing = ['LIVEKIT_URL', 'LIVEKIT_API_KEY', 'LIVEKIT_API_SECRET', 'BEY_API_KEY', 'OPENAI_API_KEY'].filter(k => !process.env[k]); if (missing.length) { console.error('❌ Missing:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ All environment variables set'); }"
